articles.author: Dr Michael Mosley
articles.title: DR MICHAEL MOSLEY: How to live 10 years longer... cheer up! - Daily Mail
articles.description: DR MICHAEL MOSLEY: There is indeed good evidence that being positive and optimistic can improve not only people in Britain's mental but also our physical health, too.
articles.content: Do you remember the scene at the end of Monty Python's Life of Brian, where Brian is being crucified and a fellow victim (played by Eric Idle) tries to cheer him up by singing Always Look on the Brig… [+9044 chars]
